00021 #ifndef _UNCAUGHTEXCEPTIONHANDLER_H
00022 #define _UNCAUGHTEXCEPTIONHANDLER_H
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 #include "Exception.h"
00026 #include "Application.h"
00027 
00028 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00029 
00030 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00031 
00032 class UncaughtExceptionHandler : public Object {
00033 public:
00034     UncaughtExceptionHandler() {}
00035     virtual ~UncaughtExceptionHandler() {}
00036     virtual void handle(const Exception & ex) const = 0;
00037 public:
00038     static UncaughtExceptionHandler * handler;
00039 };
00040 
00041 struct DefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler : public UncaughtExceptionHandler {
00042     DefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler() {}
00043     void handle(const Exception & ex) const;
00044 };
00045 
00046 struct DebugUncaughtExceptionHandler : public UncaughtExceptionHandler {
00047     DebugUncaughtExceptionHandler() {}
00048     void handle(const Exception & ex) const;
00049 };
00050 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00051 
00052 #endif /* _UNCAUGHTEXCEPTIONHANDLER_H */
